title: NancyDrewSilentSpy+DirectX+Walkthrough

Awesome game.

Game Info:

Platform: PC

Game Description:

Nearly a decade ago, Agent Kate Drew left home to neutralize a biochemical weapon in Scotland. While her assignment was a success, Kate died in a car accident. Or so we were told. Steps for installation:

1. Connect to the internet.

2. Run the DirectX Web-Setup and it will download all of the required files. It might ask for a reboot.

3. Install the game.

4. Play and enjoy. :)

All the files are clean and checked with Avira.
